乾.definition: dry; dried food; empty; hollow; taken in to nominal kinship; adoptive; foster; futile; in vain; (dialect) rude; blunt; (dialect) to cold-shoulder

乾兒子.definition: adopted son (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

乾冰.definition: dry ice (i.e. frozen CO2); CL:塊|块[kuai4]

乾咳.definition: to cough without phlegm; a dry cough

乾嘉三大家.definition: Three great poets of the Qianlong and Jiaqing era (1735-1820), namely: Yuan Mei 袁枚, Jiang Shiquan 蔣士銓|蒋士铨 and Zhao Yi 趙翼|赵翼

乾嚎.definition: to cry out loud without tears

乾坤.definition: yin and yang; heaven and earth; the universe

乾女兒.definition: adopted daughter (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

乾娘.definition: adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

乾媽.definition: adoptive mother (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

乾安.definition: Qian'an county in Songyuan 松原, Jilin

乾安縣.definition: Qian'an county in Songyuan 松原, Jilin

乾打雷，不下雨.pinyin: gan1 da3 lei2 , bu4 xia4 yu3
乾打雷，不下雨.definition: all thunder but no rain (idiom); a lot of noise but no action

乾旦.definition: male actor playing the female role (Chinese opera)

乾杯.definition: to drink a toast; Cheers! (proposing a toast); Here's to you!; Bottoms up!; lit. dry cup

乾淨利落.definition: squeaky clean; neat and tidy; efficient

乾澀.definition: dry and rough (skin); hoarse (voice); dry and heavy (style)

乾煸.definition: to stir-fry with oil only (no addition of water)

乾煸豆角.definition: green beans in sauce, popular Beijing dish

乾燥.definition: (of weather, climate, soil etc) dry; arid; (of skin, mouth etc) dry; (fig.) dull; dry; boring; (of timber etc) to dry out; to season; to cure

乾爹.definition: adoptive father (traditional adoption, i.e. without legal ramifications)

乾爽.definition: dry and clean; clear and fresh

乾物女.definition: single girl who lives a lackadaisical life, uninterested in relationships (orthographic borrowing from Japanese 干物女 "himono onna")

乾笑.definition: to give a hollow laugh; to force a smile; forced laugh; CL:聲|声[sheng1]

乾等.definition: to wait in vain; to sit around waiting

乾縣.definition: Qian County in Xianyang 咸陽|咸阳[Xian2 yang2], Shaanxi

乾脆.definition: candid; direct and to the point; simply; just; might as well

乾脆利索.definition: see 乾脆利落|干脆利落[gan1 cui4 li4 luo5]

乾脆利落.definition: (of speech or actions) direct and efficient; without fooling around

乾號.definition: to cry out loud without tears

乾裂.definition: (of dry soil etc) to crack; (of skin) to chap

乾貝.definition: conpoy; dried scallop (dried adductor muscle of a scallop)

乾貨.definition: dried food (including dried fruits, mushrooms and seafoods such as shrimp and abalone); (fig.) (coll.) knowledge presented in readily assimilable form; just what you want to know: no more, no less (no padding 水分[shui3fen4])

乾透.definition: to dry out; to dry completely

乾鍋.definition: dry pot, a type of dish in which ingredients are wok-fried, then served hot in a clay pot or on a metal pan

乾陵.definition: Qianling at Xianyang 咸陽市|咸阳市 in Shaanxi, burial site of third Tang emperor 高宗 and empress Wuzetian 武則天|武则天

乾隆.definition: the Qianlong era; Qianlong Emperor (1711-1799), sixth Qing emperor, princely title 寶親王|宝亲王[Bao3 Qin1wang2], personal name 弘曆|弘历[Hong2li4], reigned 1735-1799

乾飯.definition: plain cooked rice (as opposed to rice porridge)

乾麵.definition: noodles mixed with a sauce and served with toppings (not in a soup); (dialect) flour
